sentences.sentence: The Spanish word "acequia" is translated as "irrigation ditch."
sentences.translation: 西班牙语中的“”一词被译为“灌溉渠”。

sentences.sentence: The Court of the Long Pond (Patio de la Acequia) is perhaps the most photographed garden feature in Europe.
sentences.translation: 拉里弗花园中的长形水池庭院或许是欧洲曝光率最高的花 园庭院之一。
